classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: MATH141, or MATH221. Required in Major/Support; also satisfies GE.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, Lower-Division F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). The USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, and E.

Select 16 units from the following:

Industrial Technology Concentration: BUS215, BUS304, BUS310, BUS313, BUS384, BUS389, BUS418, BUS489; BUS/ITP 468; ITP203, ITP234, ITP275, ITP302, ITP400, ITP404, ITP408, ITP412, ITP413, ITP414, ITP419, ITP430, ITP475, ITP485.

Packaging Technology Concentration: FSN319, FSN354; ITP400, ITP403, ITP410, ITP413, ITP419, or ITP428.

If a course is taken to meet the concentration requirement, it cannot be double-counted as an approved elective. Consultation with an advisor is recommended.
